title: Trump rushes to Supreme Court, again and again
text:
Trump rushes to Supreme Court, again and again 11:24am GMT - 02:09 
The Trump Administration has repeatedly tried to appeal cases directly to the Supreme Court, skipping the federal circuit appeals level, a move that legal experts say is unusual and could have repercussions for the administration and the judiciary system.   
The Trump Administration has repeatedly tried to appeal cases directly to the Supreme Court, skipping the federal circuit appeals level, a move that legal experts say is unusual and could have repercussions for the administration and the judiciary system.  //reut.rs/2DUiDlV
